ivory.ptc.judgments.weighting

Interface WeightingScheme

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Anchor, PageRank, Spam, SrcSpam

    public interface WeightingScheme
    A weighting scheme interface that computes the confidence scores for a relevance judgment.
    Author:
    Nima Asadi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getWeight(int targetDocument, AnchorText anchorText)
      Computes a relevence score of the given anchor text (pseudo quert) and a target document (pseudo judgment)
      void initialize(FileSystem fs, String... params)
      Initializes the current weighting scheme with the given set of parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getWeight

        float getWeight(int targetDocument,
              AnchorText anchorText)
        Computes a relevence score of the given anchor text (pseudo quert) and a target document (pseudo judgment)
        Parameters:
        targetDocument - Document id for the target document.
        anchorText - Anchor text object.

      • initialize

        void initialize(FileSystem fs,
              String... params)
        Initializes the current weighting scheme with the given set of parameters.
        Parameters:
        fs - FileSystem object.
        params - Array of the string representation of the parameters needed to initialize the weighting scheme.
